original_text: Then the people of Dan went their way. And when Micah saw that they were too strong for him, he turned and went back to his home.
korean_text: 단 자손이 자기 길을 간지라 미가가 단 자손이 자기보다 강한 것을 보고 돌이켜 집으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: Then the people of Dan went their way.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 단 사람들은 자기들의 길로 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: And when Micah saw that they were too strong for him,
sentences.korean_translation: 미가가 그들이 자기보다 강한 것을 보았을 때,

sentences.original_text: he turned and went back to his home.
